<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tandem Movement](/Feats.aspx?ID=2907) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
<trait label="Tandem" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=395" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 69 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

You and your eidolon move together. You each use a single action to Stride. Either of you that has the corresponding movement type can [Burrow](/Actions.aspx?ID=93), [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33), [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=94), or [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) instead.
name: Tandem Movement
